alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:32PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lee County through 500 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Lehigh Acres, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Lovers Key State Park, Olga, Buckingham, Villas and Three Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
